decisionGates.businessTradeoff: Ship is faster, hold avoids likely compliance rework.

decisionGates.context: Mains SKU is missing model-specific DoC and language coverage.
decisionGates.businessTradeoff: Shipping now saves time but creates high compliance risk.

decisionGates.context: Scope confidence is too low for an automated pass/fail.
decisionGates.businessTradeoff: Escalation slows launch but avoids incorrect compliance claims.

slides.title: Step 1 of 8: Champion View - Triage Queue
slides.now: Start with current launch queue and identify blocked SKUs first.
slides.customerImpact: Compresses triage time for Ops and Compliance.
slides.whatUserSees: Batch table with risk tags and SKU status.
slides.whatUserClicks: Sort by Risk, open Wi-Fi Basic
slides.cartGuardChecks: Batch preflight across scope hints and evidence presence.
slides.legalBasis: No direct legal determination at this step.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Missing evidence can lead to additional requests and listing impact.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Work blocked SKUs first and defer informational warnings.
slides.fixAction: Open highest-risk SKU and start remediation.

slides.title: Step 2 of 8: Wi-Fi Blocker - RED Scope
slides.now: Show radio classification mismatch and missing RED evidence.
slides.customerImpact: Catches severe scope mistakes before submission.
slides.whatUserSees: Radio-enabled SKU with LVD/EMC-only evidence set.
slides.legalBasis: Radio equipment requires RED-aligned evidence coverage.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Submitting this state increases downstream risk.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Block submission until RED-aligned evidence is complete.
slides.fixAction: Request RED DoC and radio test package.

slides.title: Step 3 of 8: Gate - Wi-Fi Decision
slides.now: Translate blocker into ship/hold/escalate decision with rationale.
slides.customerImpact: Creates an auditable decision trail for high-risk items.
slides.whatUserSees: Gate card with recommendation and selected decision.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Bundles unresolved critical findings into one gate.
slides.legalBasis: Critical prerequisites still missing for launch.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Risk framing is guidance, not platform prediction.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: HOLD and assign corrective owners immediately.
slides.fixAction: Record hold decision and owner assignments.

slides.title: Step 4 of 8: Mains Charger - Missing DoC
slides.now: Open mains SKU with no model-specific DoC.
slides.customerImpact: Prevents avoidable launch delays caused by missing declarations.
slides.whatUserSees: 230V SKU marked blocked with missing DoC and language readiness.
slides.cartGuardChecks: LVD scope and declaration presence checks.
slides.legalBasis: In-scope mains equipment requires conformity evidence.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Do not submit until evidence is complete.
slides.fixAction: Collect model-specific DoC and document bundle.

slides.title: Step 5 of 8: Gate - Mains Decision
slides.now: Capture gate decision for mains blocker.
slides.customerImpact: Demonstrates consistent governance for repeated blocker patterns.
slides.whatUserSees: Gate with hold recommendation for missing DoC/language coverage.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Summarizes unresolved mains blockers into one gate.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Potential compliance action risk remains unresolved.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: HOLD until evidence package is complete.
slides.fixAction: Assign remediation owners and due date.

slides.title: Step 6 of 8: Unknown Scope - Escalation
slides.now: Show gray-area evidence where automation confidence is low.
slides.customerImpact: Avoids false confidence and pushes ambiguous cases to human review.
slides.legalBasis: Scope confidence is insufficient for automatic determination.
slides.marketplacePolicy: No direct marketplace rule at this stage.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Escalate to compliance/RP with artifacts attached.
slides.fixAction: Route case to senior reviewer with context package.

slides.title: Step 7 of 8: Role Packets and Handoff
slides.now: Generate Ops, Compliance, Engineering, and RP outputs.
slides.customerImpact: Turns findings into role-owned execution queues.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Issue-to-owner mapping and action field generation.
slides.legalBasis: Compliance packet keeps source-linked legal references.
slides.marketplacePolicy: No direct marketplace policy decision at this step.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Use role packets for weekly launch operations.
slides.fixAction: Distribute packets and track closure by owner.

slides.title: Step 8 of 8: Pilot KPI Close
slides.now: Set pilot success criteria and cadence with champion stakeholders.
slides.next: End demo and move to pilot kickoff planning.
slides.customerImpact: Connects workflow fit to measurable business outcomes.
slides.whatUserSees: Pilot metrics card and status mix for current launch batch.
slides.cartGuardChecks: Final readiness/risk summary for pilot scoping.
slides.legalBasis: No legal determination at final summary stage.
slides.marketplacePolicy: Risk labels are heuristic guidance, not an Amazon outcome.
slides.cartguardRecommendation: Run paid pilot with explicit KPI thresholds and weekly governance.
slides.fixAction: Confirm scope, owners, and first weekly checkpoint.
